Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service District -- 8 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Hospital Service District) 
(Millage)

Summary:  10 year, 8 mills tax for constructing, equipping, maintaining and operating hospital facilities for said Hospital Service District.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eight (8) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,300,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of constructing, equipping, maintaining and operating hospital facilities within the District?
